verbose_text: Importantly, Brca1 deficient PBM tumors treated with olaparib alone had significantly increased expression of the immune-inhibitory ligand PD-L1 on tumor cells both in vivo and in vitro, and addition of immune checkpoint blockade by PD-1 antibody to olaparib resulted in sustained suppression of PBM tumors and extended survival compared with olaparib alone where delayed tumor growth was observed.
evidence: expression of the immune-inhibitory ligand PD-L1
